Sentencas: Due to the differences in the dynamic characteristics of various energy processes, the operation and control of multi-energy coupled integrated energy systems (IES) pose significant challenges.
Titulo: Semi-physical simulation and coordinated control of SOFC-PV/T-HP system

Sentencas: This paper focuses on the semiphysical simulation and coordinated control of SOFC-PV/T-HP thermoelectric system, which includes solid oxide fuel cells, a solar photovoltaic/thermal panel and a heat pump.
Titulo: Semi-physical simulation and coordinated control of SOFC-PV/T-HP system

Sentencas: In order to enhance the experimental safety and reliability of the research findings, a semi-physical simulation platform is developed by integrating physical equipment and dynamic models.
Titulo: Semi-physical simulation and coordinated control of SOFC-PV/T-HP system

Sentencas: The operational characteristics of the cogeneration system are investigated and controlled using an extended state-space based model predictive algorithm.
Titulo: Semi-physical simulation and coordinated control of SOFC-PV/T-HP system

Sentencas: The experimental results demonstrate that the designed centralized model predictive controller effectively stabilizes the demand power of the battery.
Titulo: Semi-physical simulation and coordinated control of SOFC-PV/T-HP system

Sentencas: The standard deviation of the battery demand power is reduced from 2.39 W to 0.66 W within 500 s, which alleviates the regulation burden of the battery.
Titulo: Semi-physical simulation and coordinated control of SOFC-PV/T-HP system

Sentencas: At the same time, the hot water temperature is also well controlled.
Titulo: Semi-physical simulation and coordinated control of SOFC-PV/T-HP system

Sentencas: The fluctuation of hot water supply temperature does not exceed 0.11celcius after stability.
Titulo: Semi-physical simulation and coordinated control of SOFC-PV/T-HP system

Sentencas: The system can maintain stable operation under external disturbance, and maintain the balance between electricity/heat supply and demand.
Titulo: Semi-physical simulation and coordinated control of SOFC-PV/T-HP system
